Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 19th overall pick, by San Francisco in 1965...
Injured on 4/8/1965 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 6/2/1965 with a Hyper Extended Elbow, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 4/4/1966, off Dick Joyce (ATL)...
Earned first career win on 4/4/1966...
Was selected to the 1966 Allstar game...
Won Rookie of the Year Award in 1966, going 21-12, 3.85 ERA...
Won World Series with San Francisco in 1967...
Hit first career homerun on 6/7/1969, off George Gerberman (CHC)...
Injured on 5/29/1970 with a Strained Rotator Cuff Muscle, out for 5-6 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/14/1971, winning 2 games with a 1.00 ERA...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/2/1971, winning 2 games with a 0.00 ERA...
Was selected to the 1971 Allstar game...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 8/1/1971, going 4-1, 1.03...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/8/1972, winning 2 games with a 0.50 ERA...
Won World Series with San Francisco in 1973...
